lead_paragraph: Mel (Matthew Modine) and Ginger (Gina Gershon) couldn't be more different she's an uptight biologist, he's a life long bachelor and musician. When Mel meets a woman at a gig it will spark a series of events that will change their relationship foreve
snippet: Mel (Matthew Modine) and Ginger (Gina Gershon) couldn't be more different she's an uptight biologist, he's a life long bachelor and musician. When Mel meets a woman at a gig it will spark a series of events that will change their relationship foreve
